questions.question: 1. Which type of wear occurs due to the relative motion and interaction between two solid surfaces?
2. What is the primary mechanism of wear in adhesive wear?

answers.b: Surface deformation and material transfer between surfaces
answers.c: Hard particles or foreign objects causing surface damage
answers.d: High-velocity particle impact on a surface

questions.question: 3. In the pin-on-disc wear measurement method, the wear of a material is assessed by:

answers.b: Determining the volume of material removed from the pin
answers.c: Analyzing the surface roughness of the disc
answers.d: Monitoring the temperature increase during the test

questions.question: 4. The pin-on-disc wear test is commonly used to evaluate:

answers.b: Fatigue strength of the disc material
answers.c: Wear resistance of materials under sliding contact
answers.d: Tensile strength of the pin and disc materials

questions.question: 5. What is the primary cause of abrasive wear?

answers.b: Surface deformation and material transfer between surfaces
answers.c: High-velocity particle impact on a surface
answers.d: Hard particles or foreign objects causing surface damage
